trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for events associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 为与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DataObject" /> 类关联的事件提供抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Cancels the associated command or operation.
trans-unit.target: 取消关联的命令或操作。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.CommandCancelled%2A> property to `true`.
After an event has been canceled, it cannot be reactivated.
trans-unit.target: 已取消事件后，不能重新激活。

trans-unit.source: If this method is called on a drag-and-drop operation (as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.IsDragDrop%2A> property), the entire drag-and-drop operation is canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法称为上拖放操作 (如所示<xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.IsDragDrop%2A>属性)，将取消整个拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the associated command or operation has been canceled.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指示是否已取消了关联的命令或操作。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the command has been canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已取消了命令，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.CancelCommand%2A> method to set this property to `true` and cancel the associated command or operation.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.DataObjectEventArgs.CancelCommand%2A>方法将此属性设置为`true`和取消关联的命令或操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the associated event is part of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，指示关联的事件是否是拖放操作的一部分。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the associated event is part of a drag-and-drop operation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果关联的事件是拖放操作的一部分，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Copying> event is raised when dragging is initiated and the <xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting> event is raised when the selection is dropped.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Copying>开始拖动时，将引发事件和<xref:System.Windows.DataObject.Pasting>删除所选内容时引发事件。
